welcome_message_title: Welcome to Las Torres de Cotillas
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Las Torres de Cotillas, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Corvera International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter flights and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Javier Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at San Javier Airport handles all cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
